attributes.action: Let children work from home the last week of autumnm term.
attributes.additional_details: If children can study at home the last week of term before Christmas it will mean they shouldn’t have to self isolate over Christmas. The last day of term is Friday 18th December. If home learning took place from Monday 14th December it would mean children can keep safe at home and won’t have the anxiety of having to self isolate the Christmas period.
attributes.background: Please let children study from home the last week of term 14th-18th December.
